short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clutter-free communication: Organize your conversations into folders

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Say goodbye to cluttered inboxes and hello to a clean, organized experience.

TwInbox helps you effortlessly organize your Twitter conversations by allowing you to categorize them into customizable folders. 

𝐊𝐞𝐲 𝐅𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞𝐬
◻Organize Conversations: Categorize and sort your Twitter chats into folders.
◻Customizable Folders: Tailor your folder names and contents for a personalized experience.
◻Clutter-Free Inbox: Keep your Twitter inbox clean and easy to navigate.
◻Quick Access: Find your conversations in no time with an intuitive interface.

𝐏𝐫𝐢𝐜𝐢𝐧𝐠
🆓 The FREE version allows you to create up to 1 folder.
 A small one-time payment to unlock unlimited folders.

More Coming Soon! Stay tuned for future updates with more advanced chat management and integration features.
